page.title: 01INTRODUCING HOUNSLOW
page.content: {Hounslow}is one of eighteen Outer London Boroughs situated to the{West} of{London.}It is an area well served by rail and road .Journey time to city centre is 45 mins. by Tube.Life is dominated by the{airport}for work and travel.However,its presence brings the disadvantage of noise for local people.Many homes are sound-proofed to minimise the effects.Schools in the area often have their lessons disrupted by aircraft noise.Much industry is concentrated along the{A4} Large trading estates,housing computer companies,high-tech. workshops and warehouse facilities flank both sides of the road. Local landmarks include{Mogden Sewage} {Works}to the East,{Twickenham Rugby } {Ground}to the South-East,{Hounslow } {Heath}to the South-West &{Lampton}Park which houses the{Civic Centre.}
